name: Back to 3D
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2019

Slide 2D tiles of a 2D world to go back to your 3D home.

Controls:
W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move hero.
SPACE to push a movable tile (tile with white border) to an adjacent empty tile.

Credits:
- Game Design

- Programming
